oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Drum
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Frank Ross, Co. A, 19th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, is said to have carried this drum at the Battle of Stones River (Tenn." December 31, 1862-January 2, 1863. However, the drum more likely dates to the era of the Spanish-American War or World War I.; The drum was collected by the United Daughters of the Confederacy, Murfreesboro (Tenn.) Chapter #91. It is possible that Mr. Ross used the drum for United Confederate Veterans reunions or parades after the Civil War.
